wiki.content: Smooth Criminal is the seventh single from Michael Jackson's Bad album. The song contains a fast-paced beat intertwined with Jackson's lyrics about a woman named Annie, who has been attacked in her apartment by a suave hitman. It was released as a single in 1988 and peaked at seven on the Billboard Hot 100. It has since become one of Jackson's most popular songs. The video itself is one of the most famous of all times due to its incredible dance routines, including pretty much all the famous moves, such as the robot, the glide, and the inhuman lean. The rock band Alien Ant Farm covered this song in 2001. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Smooth Criminal is the seventh single from Michael Jackson's Bad album. The song contains a fast-paced beat intertwined with Jackson's lyrics about a woman named Annie, who has been attacked in her apartment by a suave hitman. It was released as a single in 1988 and peaked at seven on the Billboard Hot 100. It has since become one of Jackson's most popular songs. The video itself is one of the most famous of all times due to its incredible dance routines, including pretty much all the famous moves, such as the robot, the glide, and the inhuman lean.

track.name: Smooth Criminal
comments: Catchy, timeless, perfect! MJ is cool...
Anyone else feel something like extreme sadness and melancholy mixed with profound peace when they hear his heart beating at the start?
The only thing that's better than the original is the 9 minute version from "Moonwalker". Soooo fucking epic. [2]

A fact for yall...'Annie' was a CPR dummy that was in Micheal studio at the time of the recording.

I didn't say it was interesting
This version is just simply perfection
I used to think he was singing "Eddie are you walking". ;)
Annie are you okay? Are you okay, Annie? You've been hit by a smooth criminal (8) :3
i love the smooth criminal lean.
one of that songs that you feel the urge to dance and sing along
